name: Missing Cat, 고양이를 찾습니다
description:
Find Nurie, the cat that disappeared while I was getting the feed!


The protagonist and the cat (Nuri) who lived in a peaceful countryside
While you're on your way to get food, you suddenly go to the mountains to find a cat who left the house


- The main character who goes to find the cat who left the house

- Noori, the cat that left the house

an incessant movement
You can't stop once you move the main character unless it's under certain conditions The movement (←,→) given to the protagonist is only jump (C) and change direction
It's going to be a harder game because it can't be stopped

a spirit of challenge
When you make a bad jump, you come up to find the cat on the top, but if you fall down the endless mountain, you'll feel pain
Once you're used to it and you're aware of the game's movement, the jump system, you'll be able to clear it without difficulty

Please go up to the top of the mountain and find Nuri!
